data.name: Abrupt Decay
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
data.flavor_text: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

data.name: Abrupt Decay
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
data.flavor_text: The worst part isn't the pain, or the smell, or even the fear of death. It's hearing the clatter of bone on stone and knowing the bones are yours.

data.name: Active Volcano
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target blue permanent.
• Return target Island to its owner's hand.

data.name: Aerial Assault
data.oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

data.name: Aerial Predation
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

data.name: Afterlife
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

data.name: Afterlife
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: Facets of life, reflections of the soul.

data.name: Aftershock
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
data.flavor_text:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

data.name: Agonizing Demise
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If this spell was kicked, Agonizing Demise deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

data.name: Angrath's Fury
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

data.name: Annihilate
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

data.name: Asphyxiate
data.oracle_text: Destroy target untapped creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Some poisons enter through the blood. Some are ingested. Some are inhaled. All ways through which mortals draw strength are paths for poison."
—Agathe, priest of Pharika

data.name: Assassinate
data.oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
data.flavor_text: The rulers of old Dominaria kept assassins on retainer. However, the true loyalty of these master killers was always to their peers. This elite brotherhood survived the fall of the old royal order.

data.name: Assassin's Blade
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

data.name: Assassin's Ink
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control an artifact and {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: A Reckoner always has another trick up their sleeve—or as their sleeve.

data.name: Assassin's Strike
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.
data.flavor_text: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

data.name: Avenging Arrow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

data.name: Bake into a Pie
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
data.flavor_text: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

data.name: Beast Within
data.oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."
—Euphemia, Nexus watcher

data.name: Beast Within
data.oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

data.name: Bedevil
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger."
—Tajic

data.name: Befoul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"When the rampaging kami at Reito had crushed the opposing militia, swarms of minor kami swept over the battlefield to consume all that remained."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

data.name: Befoul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: The bog's touch means death to all but the darkest of hearts.

data.name: Befoul
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
—Radiant, archangel

Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, instead destroy target creature or planeswalker.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.

data.name: Bone Splinters
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.

data.name: Bone Splinters
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ."
—Gisa the Mad

data.name: Bone Splinters
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated.
Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Vampires know blood and the systems that carry it. And they know exactly where to strike to set it free.

Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.)
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"Big, wicked, and not too smart. Poor thing never stood a chance against us, dear."
—Regna, to Krav

data.name: Broken Visage
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

data.name: Broken Visage
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

data.name: Broken Wings
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: New Capenna's demonic masters are quick to extinguish any hint of the angels' power reawakening.

data.name: Broken Wings
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Fynn climbed the highest peak and waited, still and silent, until the falling snow had hidden him entirely. When the great eagle flew past, the hunter's aim was true."
—*Saga of the Wisdom Seeker*

data.name: Broken Wings
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: Getting airborne with a kitesail is easy. It's everything afterward that takes focus, skill, and luck.

data.name: Cast Down
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text:
"We simply cannot tolerate a petty thief among the servants. I'm afraid I'll have to let you go."
—Rog, steward of House Rillyn

data.name: Cast Down
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
—*Chainer's Torment*

"Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out."
—Heidar, Rimewind master

data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

data.flavor_text:

data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.

data.flavor_text:

—William Shakespeare,
*Romeo and Juliet*

data.name: Dark Banishing

data.flavor_text:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

data.name: Dark Banishing
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Femeref was guided by the wisdom of the Council of Voices. But in one terrible instant, they were slain, leaving Asmira as the sole voice of leadership."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

data.name: Dark Banishing
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither."
—Leshrac, Walker of Night

data.name: Dark Betrayal
data.oracle_text: Destroy target black creature.

—Basarios the Blade

data.flavor_text: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse—the curse had been fulfilled.

data.oracle_text: Destroy target non-Elf creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

data.name: Fatal Blow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?"
—Crovax

data.name: Fatal Push
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

data.name: Fatal Push
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

data.name: Fatal Push
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

data.name: Fatal Push
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

data.name: Fateful Absence
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller investigates. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: Sensing a plot, Sorin raced to his grandfather's resting-crypt. But someone else had gotten there first.

data.name: Feast of Blood
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"The vampires of this world don't know the pleasures of hunger. They gorge themselves without savoring the kill."
—Sorin Markov

data.name: Feast of Blood
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: Imbued in the Ancient Fang were spells far darker than any Dack Fayden would cast.

data.name: Feast of Dreams
data.oracle_text: Destroy target enchanted creature or enchantment creature.
data.flavor_text: "We gave the gods the power to war against us. It is time we took that power back."

data.name: Feast or Famine
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The living cannot understand the benefits of death."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

data.name: Feast or Famine
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

data.name: Feast or Famine
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

data.name: Feed the Swarm
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
data.flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

data.name: Fierce Retribution
data.oracle_text:
Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Destroy target [attacking] creature.
data.flavor_text: "It won't bring them back, but it will bring me peace."

data.name: Final Payment
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: There's nothing quite like the feeling of paying off a large debt.

data.name: Finders, Keepers
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
data.flavor_text: The S.N.E.A.K. Code clearly permits looting corpses for parts. That just meant Agent 47.3 had to make sure her target was dead first.

data.name: Finishing Blow
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: "In this world, it's kill or be killed. I'd rather not be the latter."

data.name: Fissure
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: "Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?" —Plato

data.name: Flash Flood
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target red permanent.
• Return target Mountain to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

data.name: Flesh Allergy
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

data.name: Flesh to Dust
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Pain is temporary. So is life."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Foul Play
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: The evidence was overwhelming. Tovolar's howlpack was getting bolder, smarter, and stronger.

data.name: Fumarole
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 3 life.
Destroy target creature and target land.
data.flavor_text:
"Too many of us have died in the explosions that wrack these hills."
—Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

data.name: Gang Up
data.oracle_text:
Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.)
Destroy target creature with power X or less.
data.flavor_text:
"Well, who do we have here, Gorm?"
"No one, Virtus. No one at all."

data.name: Get the Point
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Scry 1.
data.flavor_text:
"Vraska sees the grandeur in death but misses the hilarity."
—Judith

data.name: Ghastly Demise
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively."
—Braids, dementia summoner

data.name: Ghostly Visit
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
data.flavor_text: Cao Cao was haunted to death by the ghosts of the empresses and other high courtiers he had murdered.

data.name: Gloomlance
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was green or white, its controller discards a card.
data.flavor_text: Death stings the victim only once, but those left behind feel the pain of loss with every passing memory.

data.name: Gloomwidow's Feast
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. If that creature was blue or black, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
data.flavor_text: Each night, gloomwidows cull fresh prey for their ravenous hatchlings.

data.name: Go for the Throat
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
data.flavor_text: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

data.name: Go for the Throat
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
data.flavor_text: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

data.name: Grim Bounty
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
data.flavor_text: Freed from the need to pay tribute to the dragon, the villages gladly paid the dragon-slayers instead.

data.name: Grisly Ritual
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create two Blood tokens. (They're artifacts with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text:
"You can always tell who's new from the screaming."
—Tinua, Skirsdag cultist

data.name: Grisly Spectacle
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller mills cards equal to that creature's power.
data.flavor_text:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

data.name: Guiding Bolt
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

data.name: Hand of Death
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
data.flavor_text: The touch of death is never gentle.

data.name: Hand of Death
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
data.flavor_text: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

data.name: Hearth Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact creature.
• Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

data.name: Heartless Act
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with no counters on it.
• Remove up to three counters from target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"It's them or us."
—General Kudro

data.name: Hero's Demise
data.oracle_text: Destroy target legendary creature.
data.flavor_text:
"What will it say on our graves, Lord Konda? Will it say we led our world to conquer immortal forces or that we were crushed by our own arrogance? At each defeat, I wonder."
—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

data.name: Hero's Downfall
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Odric resisted the vampire's curse with all his strength. But after a lifetime of fighting monsters, he was doomed to become one himself.

data.name: Hero's Downfall
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.

data.name: Hero's Downfall
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: "This is the end... for all of you!"

data.name: Hero's Downfall
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Destiny exalts a chosen few, but even heroes break.

data.name: Hideous End
data.oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
data.flavor_text:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

data.name: Horobi's Whisper
data.oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, destroy target nonblack creature.
Splice onto Arcane—Exile four cards from your graveyard. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

data.name: Human Frailty
data.oracle_text: Destroy target Human creature.
data.flavor_text:
"I have seen a hundred mortal families rise and fall. I shall outlast a thousand more."
—Olivia Voldaren

data.name: Humble the Brute
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: "The element of surprise only works when it's backed up by a bolt between the eyes."

data.name: Immolating Glare
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The sun can warm your skin or blister it, nurture your crops or wither them, light your path or blind you. She is a fickle friend, but a far worse enemy."
—Nazra of the Stone Havens

data.name: Immolating Glare
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.

data.name: Impale
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
data.flavor_text: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.

data.name: Infernal Grasp
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.
data.flavor_text: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.

data.name: Inscription of Ruin
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{B}{B}
Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.

data.name: Into the Maw of Hell
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Into the Maw of Hell deals 13 damage to target creature.
data.flavor_text: Few entrances lead to where demons and devils lurk. Unfortunately, they occasionally open new ones.

data.name: Just Fate
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target attacking creature.

data.name: Kaervek's Purge
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value X. If that creature dies this way, Kaervek's Purge deals damage equal to the creature's power to the creature's controller.

data.name: Kill! Destroy!
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target nonblack creature.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "kill" or "destroy," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Kill! Destroy! from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Getting "Gotcha'ed" again and again.

data.name: Killing Glare
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power X or less.
data.flavor_text: A casual glance into a dark corner may be your last.

data.name: Kill Shot
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
data.flavor_text:
"In the assassination trade, no one lives to make more than one mistake."
—Anhelo, the Painter

data.name: Kill Shot
data.oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
data.flavor_text: Mardu archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They never miss their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.
